reviewText: We own this tape and watch it at least once a month.  We love Michael J. Fox and enjoyed him and the rest of the cast.  This is a light, humerous love story (in my opinion) and can be watched over and over.  This one is a keeper.

I purchased this DVD because it is truly a great value for the money and I love 2 out of the 3 movies on it.  Doc Hollywood is a fun and very well done movie.  I live in FL and it was filmed in Micanopy, FL, not in Grady NC.  There is a wonderful b&b in Micanopy and lots of little antique stores to shop in.

I loved Doc Hollywood and Michael. Mr Wonderful was ok. Doc Hollywood and Michael are must see for the PG 13(small amount of nudity)entire family. Must haves for anyones collection. City of Angels another must have family favorite!

Doc Hollywood & Mr Wonderful & Michael (2disc) We enjoyed these DVD's very much and We trust Amazon.com to send quality DVD's. We were told by someone we trust that it was a good place to do business.

I really purchased this DVD for the movie "Doc Hollywood". I did not realize that the other movies were on the DVD until I received it. I enjoyed watch Doc Hollywood as it is one of my favorite Michael J Fox movies. I never watched the others.
love Mr. Wonderful very good ending

Doc Hollywood and Michael are terrific movies.  Mr Wonderful is good, but the dialect might appeal more to people in the NE USA.
I enjoy this light hearted movie. I love the pig!!! I loved the scene with them in the boat watching the fireworks, great scene.
Three movies for the price of one - how could you go wrong? I bought this for Doc Hollywood, which I love, and got two more movies as a bonus.

Doc Hollywood is the BEST EVER! It was great to find all three of these good movies in one. I bought it as a gift and received a lovely "Thank You" card and they said they will enjoy it over and over; oh, and their favorite was Doc Hollywood too.
The movie came in one piece and played beautifully. I forgot just what a good movie it was and it came with two more movires!

My two favourite movies are Doc Hollywood & Michael. Doc Hollywood I have watched too many times to count & this was a back up purchase. Love Michael J Fox in all his movie rolls & finding Michael included in the deal was a must have.
John Travolta [ another fav] portrays the arc angel without effort, liked him also in phenomenon. Mr Wonderful is ok as a filler.
